name: @franleplant/reform
description: Form validation library for Javascript, Typescript, React and the web

scripts.pre:publish: npm run test:travis && npm run build:docs && npm run build
scripts.test:travis: npm run test:typecheck && jest --coverage && npm run test:docs
scripts.build:docs: typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --tsconfig ./typedocconfig.json --out ./docs --name Reform --module commonjs --json docsContent.json src/index.ts && node docs-src/build.js
scripts.examples-js: npm run link-examples && cd ./examples && npm run start
scripts.examples-ts: npm run link-examples && cd ./examples-ts && npm run start

author: franleplant@gmail.com
